top_product: Top Product: Our top product is our premium wedding catering package, which includes a fully customized multi-course menu, live food counters, traditional Kerala and multi-cuisine options, professional service staff, and complete buffet setup.
ideal_referral: Ideal Referral: My ideal referral is someone planning a wedding, engagement, corporate event, or family celebration who needs high-quality, reliable catering services. This could be brides or grooms-to-be, event planners, venue managers, corporate HR teams, or families hosting large functions.
top_problem_solved: Top Problem Solved: We help clients eliminate the stress of managing food and service for large events. Many hosts struggle with coordinating multiple vendors, ensuring food quality, and delivering on guest expectations. At Mezban Caterers & Events, we provide end-to-end catering solutions—from planning menus to executing flawless service—so our clients can enjoy their event with complete peace of mind.
my_favourite_bni_story: Favourite BNI Story: My favourite BNI story is about how a single referral from a fellow member led to one of the biggest wedding catering contracts we’ve ever handled. The event was a huge success and brought in several more bookings through guest referrals. It reminded me of the true power of BNI—not just for generating business, but for building trust-based relationships that open doors to long-term growth. That one introduction turned into a chain of opportunities I wouldn’t have found on my own.

name: Baiju Ranganathan
company_address: Crest Builders and Developers Chitralayam TC 92/1821 Karichara,  Pallipuram PO Kaniyapuram Kerala 695316, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, 695316
my_business:
I am Baiju Ranganathan, founder of Crest Builders and Developers, specialized in the Construction, Renovations and Maintenance of all Residential and Office buildings.
With more than 32 years of hands-on experience in both Kerala and Middle East, I lead a team committed to quality workmanship, timely delivery and complete client satisfaction. 
Whether it's building a new home, renovating an existing one, or ongoing maintenance, we handle every project with professionalism and personnel attention. Our services are tailored for home owners, NRI's, real estate investors and families looking to build or upgrade their dream homes.
top_product: Renovation of Premium Villa at Kaniyapuram Construct a Premium Villa at Karichara
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is someone who is planning to build, renovate, or maintain a residential property and needs a reliable, experienced contractor to guide them from start to finish.
top_problem_solved: I helped a client facing a major challenge with a congested staircase area, along with poorly planned kitchen and bedroom layouts. Through smart space planning and creative design solutions, I was able to open up the staircase area, improve circulation, and redesign the kitchen and bedrooms for maximum functionality and comfort. The transformation impressed the client and significantly improved the livability of the home.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of the most inspiring memorable moment I have experienced in BNI was hearing Mr. Dennis, a fellow member and Paint manufacturer, share how BNI helped him take a major step forward in his business. During a regular meeting he explained how he was introduced though a BNI member to the Owner of a Leading hospital group in Trivandrum. He impressed by the quality, durability and safety standards of his paint products, the hospital decided to use his -brand in all their buildings. this story is a powerful reminder of how one genuine connection in BNI can lead to extraordinary opportunities.

name: Biswajith J S
company_address: Paithrika Homes, Market Junction Kuravankonam Kowdiar P.O Trivandrum Kerala, Trivandrum, kerala, 695003
top_product: 1. Premium Villas 2. Custom-Built Homes 3. Residential plot developments.
top_problem_solved: 1. Simplifying the Home-buying process. 2. Quality assurance in construction. 3. End to End Project Management. 4. Reliable vendor and resource management.
my_favourite_bni_story: Good morning BNI Maximus, My BNI story is quite unique. About five years ago, our CMD Mr. Abhilash received a call from Mr. Vikas inviting him to attend a BNI meeting. I was with him that day, and we both looked at each other wondering—what exactly is BNI? Out of curiosity, we decided to attend online. Abhilash went in, but after the meeting, we both felt—maybe this is not our cup of tea. Time passed, we grew in our own way, and BNI also grew in its own way. But as they say—God always has a plan. Years later, our close friend Mr. Sameer reintroduced us to BNI. He insisted I attend, and though I was hesitant at first, I finally joined an online meeting of the Monarch chapter. That meeting gave me a small spark. After some thinking—and a lot of Sameer’s push—I finally decided to join. And that’s how Paithrika Homes became part of BNI. Looking back, I can say it was one of the best decisions I’ve made. BNI helped me connect with amazing professionals in Trivandrum, attend trainings that re-energized me, and regain the enthusiasm I once had. Now, waking up early for a 7:30 AM meeting is no longer a task—it’s something I eagerly look forward to every week. For me, BNI is not just a network—it’s a family. I am truly grateful to be a part of it. Thank you.

name: Dr Akshay Mohan
company_address: Ayra Dentistry- Advanced orthodontic & family dental care ,TC 25/2854/1, Anugraha  ,Nanthancode., Kowdiar PO Thiruvananthapuram Kerala 695003, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, 695003
my_business: At Ayra Dentistry, we bring over 5 years of expertise and the trust of 1000+ happy patients, specializing in advanced orthodontic and family dental care in Trivandrum (Kerala) and Nagercoil (Tamil Nadu). Led by two highly qualified orthodontists, Dr. Akshay Mohan (MDS) and Dr. Arathy LR (MDS), our clinics are among the top-reviewed, premier, and exclusive Invisalign and orthodontic centers in the region. With state-of-the-art facilities including intraoral scanners, digital RVG, and the latest equipment, we ensure precision, comfort, and excellence in treatments ranging from Invisalign and orthodontic braces to root canals, implants, and tooth replacements — all under one roof. At Ayra Dentistry, we are committed to delivering high-quality dental care with professionalism, advanced technology, and patient-first service.
top_product: Invisalign clear aligners Damon orthodontic braces Root Canal treatment (single sitting) Zirconia Crowns Implants
ideal_referral: Anyone looking for - Smile correction - Teeth Alignment - Pain Relief -Missing teeth replacement - Teeth cleaning and whitening
top_problem_solved: Complicated teeth alignment cases combined with jaw problems successfully treated successfully with Invisalign aligners & orthodontic braces within 1 year when expected treatment was 2.5 -3 years
my_favourite_bni_story: I’ll never forget the time a member referred a whole family to our clinic. They trusted us with their kids’ orthodontic care with Invisalign and even recommended our clinic to their extended family — a true testament to how referrals create lasting impact.

name: Uma J
company_address: Tc 18/1079-1 first floor Kuravankonam Kowdiar Trivandrum Kerala, Parambukonam, Trivandrum, Kerala, 695003
my_business: Mukhi Boutique, located in Kuravankonam, is your one-stop destination for all kinds of stitching and customization. We specialize in budget-friendly bridal wear for men, women, and kids, offering unique designs tailored to every occasion. From elegant bridal lehengas and saree blouses to sharp groom’s suits and ethnic wear for kids, we bring creativity, quality, and personal attention into every outfit. Our mission is to make every client look and feel their best, without compromising on comfort or budget.
top_product: Bridal Wear (Lehengas, Saree Blouses, Gowns) Groom Wear (Sherwanis, Suits, Ethnic Wear) Customized Kids Wear for Weddings & Events Family Wedding Outfit Coordination Designer Blouses & Occasion Wear Men’s & Women’s Party Wear Customization
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is wedding planners, event managers, photographers, and makeup artists who can connect me to clients needing customized bridal and groom wear.
top_problem_solved: 1. Last-minute outfit needs – We handle urgent stitching and customization so clients don’t stress before an event. 2. Finding budget-friendly bridal & groom wear – We create beautiful wedding outfits without overspending. 3. Perfect fit issues – We specialize in custom tailoring to ensure every client feels comfortable and confident. 4. Unique, personalized designs – We provide one-of-a-kind outfits that match the client’s style instead of readymade, common designs. 5. Family outfit coordination – We design matching or theme-based outfits for the whole family for weddings or events.
my_favourite_bni_story: My favourite BNI story is seeing how one referral can create a chain reaction of opportunities, not just for one person but for many members. That teamwork is truly inspiring

name: Vamsi Krishna
company_address: Viswapriya GCN 232 GC Nagar 2nd St, Mannamoola, Peroorkada, Trivandrum, KERALA, 695005
my_business: PrototypeIT LLP is Trivandrum’s pioneering 3D printing and digital fabrication studio, offering end-to-end solutions in 3D printing, scanning, and CAD modeling. We specialize in transforming ideas into tangible prototypes—serving architects, product designers, engineers, and entrepreneurs. Whether it's reverse engineering, rapid prototyping, or precision modeling, our team blends technical expertise with local insight to deliver scalable, cost-effective results. From concept to creation, we help businesses and creators bring their visions to life.
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is a product designer, architect, educator, or startup founder who needs fast, precise, and affordable 3D printing. Whether they’re prototyping a new product, visualizing a concept, or creating educational models, I help them turn digital designs into tangible reality—right here in Trivandrum.
top_problem_solved: We help businesses and creative ventures in Trivandrum and beyond bring their ideas to life—physically and digitally.
my_favourite_bni_story: I heard the story of Green Wrap about how they got an oppurtunity to meet Kalyan Silks MD and was able to impress him with a 1 minute pitch. I think that deal is one of the best till date in Trivandrum BNI circle.
